data.name: Any% All-Stars
data.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible by any means necessary.

Timing is done using the SDA standard: 
Start - The frame before Mario starts moving right, when the screen is fully bright after loading 1-1.
End - The frame sprites become invisible after touching the axe in 8-4. 

Approved hardware/software (please specify in the run comment):
- Original SNES or Super Famicom
- Original SNES or Super Famicom with Super Everdrive or SD2SNES
- Wii, Wii U and 3DS Virtual Console
- Wii All-Stars Rerelease
- Snes9x or Bizhawk

Important rules (please read before submitting):
- All times require a video.
- Turbo/Autofire and left+right/up+down are banned.
- Times below 5:06.00 are treated with suspicion. It is highly recommended that you stream all of your attempts and provide split files to have your run accepted. 
- Using savestates to the title screen is prohibited. You must use the reset function on your emulator or console and the reset must be shown in the video.
